meanings.definition: A person who is extremely unpleasant or despicable.
meanings.sent1: That motherfucker stole my lunch money!
meanings.sent2: I can't stand that motherfucker who always parks in my spot.
meanings.sent3: I never want to be stuck in a group project with that motherfucker again.
meanings.sent4: The boss is a real motherfucker, always making us work late.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was such a motherfucker, you couldn't help but hate him.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier or expletive in expressions of anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Motherfucker! I can't believe I missed the bus again.
meanings.sent2: When I saw the huge line at the DMV, I just thought, motherfucker.
meanings.sent3: Motherfucker, I spilled coffee all over my new shirt.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm was so loud, it made me yell out, motherfucker!
meanings.sent5: Motherfucker, that was the last piece of cake in the fridge!
